title: US authorizes export of advanced American semiconductors to companies in Saudi, UAE
description: The U.S. Commerce Department said on Wednesday it has authorized the export of advanced artificial intelligence chips, the equivalent of up to 35,000 Nvidia Blackwell chips, to two companies in Saudi Arabia and the United Arab Emirates.
content:
The companies, G42, which is a state-run AI company based in Abu Dhabi, and Humain, which is a Saudi government-backed AI venture, have big data center projects planned in their respective countries.

description: The U.S. Commerce Department said on Wednesday it has authorized the export of advanced artificial intelligence chips, the equivalent of up to 35,000 NVIDIA Blackwell chips, to two companies in Saudi Arabia and the United Arab Emirates. title: Yann LeCun, a Pioneering A.I. Scientist, Leaves Meta
description: Dr. LeCun’s departure follows a shake-up in Meta’s artificial intelligence efforts, as Mark Zuckerberg pushes his company to keep up in the tech race.
content:
Yann LeCun, a pioneering scientist who led Meta’s artificial intelligence research efforts for more than a decade, is leaving the company to create his own start-up, he said on Wednesday.

title: UPDATE 2-Trump considering executive order to preempt state AI laws
description: U.S. President Donald Trump is considering an executive order that would seek to preempt state laws on artificial intelligence through lawsuits and by withholding federal funding, according to a draft of the order seen by Reuters on Wednesday.

title: Globe Summit: Area man makes a living fighting ‘The Man,’ becomes CEO
description: For Ben Collins, CEO of the satirical media company The Onion, the answer to tyranny and corruption is humor.
